list.name: Charles Carmichael
list.biography: Charles "Chuck" Carmichael has been at it a very very long time.  He knows the river like the back of his hand and is qualified to guide any of the offered activities.

list.name: Swan Ronson
list.biography: In addition to guiding fishing and rafting groups, Swan handles most of the background work to run the company.  For this reason, she can only guide a few groups each week.

list.name: Luke Skywalker
list.biography: As the newest member of the Salmon River Adventures crew, he is only qualified to guide fishing tours.  He sure knows his stuff and is quickly learning the river and has a contagious energy.
